title: Kickoff Call - Test Onboarding Project
summary: Kickoff call completed. Reviewed project scope, milestones, and communication plan. Client confirmed Slack as primary channel. First milestone: API integration due in 2 weeks.
transcript:
Host: Welcome to the kickoff! Let's review the scope.
Client: Sounds good. We're excited to get started.
Host: First milestone is API integration, due in two weeks. We'll use Slack for daily updates.
Client: Perfect. Our team is ready.
